mapper.select: select b.*, m.nickname, m.profile_image from book_collection b left join member m on b.member_id = m.id order by dbms_random.random

select b.*, l.no list_no, l.book_collection_no, l.isbn13, f.title, f.author, f.publisher, f.cover, m.nickname from book_collection b left join book_collection_list l on b.no = l.book_collection_no left join book_info f on l.isbn13 = f.isbn13 left join member m on b.member_id = m.id where b.no = #{no} order by l.regDate desc
select count(*) from book_collection_list where book_collection_no = #{no}
